gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 116, Trail Blazers 110
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Anthony Davis 30 points,13 rebounds, and six assists, the Lakers defeated the Trail Blazers, 116-110. Rui Hachimura added 19 points and five rebounds for the Lakers in the victory, while Jerami Grant tallied 23 points and five rebounds for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Lakers improve to 5-5 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 3-6.
